'''Realms alpha build 2''' is the second build version released for the Realms phase of [[Pocket Edition v0.15.0 alpha|v0.15.0 alpha]]. It was released to primarily fix crashes related to [[Realms]].<ref>{{tweet|_tomcc|720910855563583488|We've updated the Realms alpha to build 2, see if it crashes less :)}}</ref>

== Changes ==
*Version number now reads "Realms Alpha Build 2" instead of "0.15.0 Alpha Build 2"

== Fixes ==

'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE-10409?jql=project%20%3D%20MCPE%20AND%20fixVersion%20%3D%20%220.15.0%20Realms%20Alpha%20build%202%22%20ORDER%20BY%20updated%20DESC%2C%20priority%20DESC%2C%20created%20ASC 1 bug fixed]'''

'''From released versions before v0.15.0'''
* {{bug|MCPE-11456}} – Blocks above pressure plate do not update when block below pressure plate is destroyed</onlyinclude>
